markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clan Pistol](/Feats.aspx?ID=3281) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 200 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Access**
You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

</column>

---

Raised in the ancient halls of Dongun Hold or the surrounding region, you display your lineage with a clan pistol, rather than a clan dagger. You get one clan pistol of your clan for free, as it was given to you at birth. This replaces your [clan dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=13). Selling this pistol is a terrible taboo and earns you the disdain of other dwarves. You are trained with the clan pistol. In addition, when your clan pistol is visible, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) or [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) when interacting with citizens of Alkenstar, Dongun Hold, or their allies.
